title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2213.23 - Loan collection efforts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2213.23 - Loan collection efforts

State Regulations

Collection activities shall be set forth in the program's
default avoidance and claim manual. The program's default avoidance and claim
manual shall be reviewed periodically for revisions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2213.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
